title: Drawing, "Design for a Teapot", 1935
medium: Pen and black, brown ink,  yellow color pencil, graphite on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower center: THEIERE; lower right: J.P./35; in graphite, upper right: trop petite (underlined); right: No II.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Oval shaped teapot with flared sides drawn in plan and elevation, wide lip decorated on the top with a band indicated in yellow color pencil. rounded lid surmounted by a cylindeical finial decorated on either side with a circular boss, continuing in a band along the top of the lid toward handle indicated in brown ink and graphite. C-scroll handle decorated at the top with motif similar to finial indicated in brown ink and graphite. Body with applied reeded band which attaches handle to body. Raised on a tapering base decorated with two applied  bands indicated in yellow color pencil. Underdrawing in graphite of teapot in golden section.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Teapot", 1935.
1935. Pen and black, brown ink,  yellow color pencil, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-67.
